ygData.subject: Re: RE: Harmonic's Distorted view of Dragon Raids (and  some  P.S.'s for Sylly)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hmm, I noticed that earlier this week on Naggy, before I went LD, that is. :( I figured it was a case of my resists being high enough that I instantly
ygData.messageBody:
"Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" wrote:

> ok i asked this before but everyone may have missed it. i believe Nag's
> fear spell is called Dragon Roar, correct? well that's the one i see that
> looks like fear and it says i resist the Dragon Roar spell. now, i can't
> even remember the last time i was feared, but what happens now is sometimes
> i get the resist message as expected, and other times i get the message that
> i lose control of myself and i have the fear icon, but there is no effect
> (i.e. i am undoubtedly not feared). what's up with that?

Hmm, I noticed that earlier this week on Naggy, before I went LD, that is. :(
I figured it was a case of my resists being high enough that I instantly broke out
of the fear spell before it affected me. Kind of like how mobs do with our songs.
Pets and a few PCs here and there were definately running off once in a while,
so his fear isn't broken. Heh, maybe bards are now immune? :)

-Lohengrin, 45th bard of Rallos Zek
